LabelText: Record suspected unauthorized access indicators (alerts, logs, user reports)
Identify compromised user account or system
Immediately revoke credentials or disable impacted accounts
Force global logout and reset passwords/API keys linked to the account
Confirm MFA enrollment and review authentication logs
Analyze logs to determine scope of access (files, emails, systems, data)
Determine method of initial compromise (phishing, credential stuffing, token theft)
Check affected system for malware, rootkits, or unauthorized tools
Notify affected users, leadership, compliance, and IR team
Implement hardening (MFA enforcement, conditional access, password rotation)
Monitor for repeated access attempts or lateral movement
Document root cause, timeline, and corrective actions
